messages.content: Lyra quietly walks in the rain

The rain falls in steady sheets, cool and persistent, drumming against your cloak and the muddy trail beneath your boots. The earthy scent of wet grass mixes with the distant, brackish smell of the marsh, and each sodden step squelches softly as you approach the Crossing Inn, its lanterns a warm glow in the gloom.

story_log: The rain falls in steady sheets, cool and persistent, drumming against your cloak and the muddy trail beneath your boots.
